attributes.action: Full disclosure of details of all meetings held senior figures in the News Internation group with the Prime Minister & Chancellor of the Exchequer
attributes.additional_details:
Full disclosure to the public of mintutes of all meetings with the Prime Minister & the Chancellor of the Exchequer and members of News International Group.

To ascertain the reasons for each meeting and any agreements made during the meeting.

To legislate that all meetings with members of any media corporation are in future are announced to the public with full minutes made available.
